Projects

Projects under 4I Labs

Arle

Posts Docs

A project aimed at library maintenance by keeping the books sorted and in proper location. This will be achieved by an autonomous robot which can pick and place books from various locations in the library and keep it in the correct shelf.

Hexacopter

Posts Docs

The most advanced UAV being developed for surveillence on Kaziranga WildLife Park for oberservation and protection of wildlife.

Antahsagari

Posts Docs

An underwater ROV being developed for observing under water, capable of fine movement and maneuverability.

Raman, Humanoid

Posts Docs

Raman is a powerful android robot being designed in the form of an adult human, with its body shape builtto resemble the human body. Our objective is to explore and research the field of robotics to make facilitate robot’sinteraction and cooperation with humans.
